name: Space Food (AlModem)
description:
This is a space shooter game, my first ever game to be made and published. It is styled as the old arcade vertical shooter type. However with one small difference... You play as the boss character.

Any and Everything can be eaten for points. The more points you accumulate however, the more the space shooters will see you as a threat and send more various space shooters after you, and in more frequency.

You have 100 health, so see how long you can survive the onslaught, and how much you can eat before you come to your demise.
